amendment.description: Amendment modifies the section 511 Railroad Loan Guarantee Program to make it more accessible for small carriers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of November 29 as amendment No. 2, to add language amending railroad loan guidelines, in order to encourage loan assistance to regional and short line railroads.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clement amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
